categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Rebel Alliance conducted a mission to the Galactic Empire's communications hub at Sunfall Peak in order to disrupt the communications link. The operators split into two teams, Bantha and Thumper. Their transport was destroyed, but Bantha created a diversion at an administration center while Thumper infiltrated the hub to place explosives. Ryenne stole a shuttle to escape while Thumper completed the mission. Team Bantha then rendezvoused, with Ryenne hacking the door to allow them to escape. Alliance reinforcements then arrived.
The mission appears in the opening short narrative of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
